verbose_text: Overall, these results indicate that miR-141 is capable of functionally disrupting the EMT switch in HK-2 cell by maintaining relative high levels of E-cadherin expression, which is consistent with previous studies reporting that the miR-200 family inhibits EMT by targeting E-cadherin transcriptional repressors.
evidence: miR-200 family inhibits EMT by targeting E-cadherin
